Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Edward J. Sweeney Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Edward J. Sweeney Memorial Bridge" in the town of Hempstead, county of Nassau.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Edward J. Sweeney Memorial Bridge"
